description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Take control of your Avatar and gamble your way to glory in the infamous Zombie Monkey Arena! Fight for your honor against hordes of Zombie Monkeys by smashing them to bananas.
